title: MUSA 5080 Portfolio
text:
This portfolio documents my learning journey in Public Policy Analytics (CPLN 5920).


Advanced spatial analysis and data science for urban planning and public policy.




Labs: Completed assignments and analyses
Final Project: Capstone modeling challenge




I am an associate professor in the Department of City and Regional Planning at Penn. I direct the smart city concentration within our Masters in City Planning program. This is my first time teaching PPA. I have previously taught Sensing the City (an Arduino-based course on using microsensors for dynamic and responsive cities) and GIS.




Email: [your.email@upenn.edu]
GitHub: [@your-username]
